title: IBM MDM Training
description: Mindmajix IBM MDM Training makes you an expert in the understanding of InfoSphere MDM Architecture (including the Virtual and Physical Hubs) & how to use, and customize the IBM InfoSphere MDM using the IBM InfoSphere MDM Workbench.
instructor_bio: Prabhu has got 5+ years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.
review|1|review: With My Personal Experience, I Can Vouch That, Mindmajix is an Excellent training Institute For IBM MDM Training. Before Joining, You can attend The Demo Classes for free.
review|2|review: It was a wonderful learning experience. Trainer's knowledge is impressive, and great teaching capability. The course content is great. The session was interactive which was very good. I have gained in-depth knowledge on all the concepts of IBM MDM. Thanks for everything Mindmajix.
review|3|review: Thank You for the online sessions that helped me gaining knowledge in IBM MDM. Trainers helped me to get detailed information regarding the key concepts and challenging tasks in real time. Thanks again....!
content: ['InfoSphere MDM Architecture', 'Physical MDM Data Additions', 'Physical MDM Data Extensions']
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified IBM MDM Professional

title: Informatica Data Quality Training and Certification Course Online
description: By enrolling into Mindmajix’s Informatica IDQ training, you will gain a strong foundation on fundamental concepts and principles of IDQ, and acquire hands-on skills in the creation of objects and projects, build and debug data quality mappings, power center integration, and more through practical examples, and this will enable you to become a certified Informatica Data Quality professional.
what_will_learn: |The basic mapping design using Informatica Workflow Manager and monitoring the workflow through a monitoring tool|Use input and output ports to add transformations|Work with expression syntax and transformation functions|Perform mappings (SCD1, SCD2, and SCD3)|Gain knowledge on Informatica workflow variables and session parameters|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the IDQ course?There are no prerequisites for this training. But, basic knowledge of:

SQL,
Databases, and
Some scripting language would be an added advantage
target_students: |ETL professionals|Data-warehousing professionals|SQL and database developers|Business Intelligence professionals|Mainframe professionals|
instructor_bio: With 7.5+ years of experience in training and nine years of working experience, Bishnu is a certified professional, has trained more than 150 students and delivered seven corporate firms with live online sessions worldwide.
review|1|review: I was little aware of Informatica Data Quality prior. But here I've learned much more in Informatica Data Quality training as they demonstrated with a good set of examples. I got everything that is required to become an expert in IDQ. Good job Mindmajix.
review|2|review: I'm software developer who got trained for Vagrant to manage projects. I'm very much satisfied with the Informatica Data Quality course. Thank You Mindmajix.
review|3|review: I took IDQ online training Extremely satisfied with the training. Your commitment was very much appreciable. The way of communication was also excellent so that we did not face any major problems in any of the Sessions.
review|4|review: Comprehensive & Quality Training - I had enrolled for the Informatica Data Quality certification course with Mindmajix a few months back, honestly, I was pleased with services, Good learning platform. Thanks a lot.
content: ['Installation of Software in your own system', 'Walkthrough of the tool and Data warehouse concept', 'Case study and data setup']
short_description: Become an Expert in Analyzing Profile, Cleansing, and Implementing Data Quality with Informatica Data Quality Certification Course.

title: Informatica MDM Training
description: Mindmajix Informatica MDM training provides in-detailed knowledge of Informatica MDM architecture, data process flow, Informatica data director, data management tools, workflows, and more through real-world examples, and also offers hands-on projects to sharpen your skills and clear the Informatica MDM certification exam. Enroll now and get certified.
what_will_learn: |Get an overview of Informatica Master Data Management (MDM) solution architecture and its key components|Create data model elements and define the relationships in the data model  |Master the lookups in the data model|Configure the stage process in the Informatica MDM|Configure load process and Merge process for the Informatica MDM solution|Create a Message Queue in Application server|Configure the ORS Specific Schema|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Informatica MDM course?The prerequisites for learning Informatica MDM are listed below:

The participant should have basic knowledge of relational databases and database modeling.
The participant should have knowledge on Java.
The participant should be familiar with ETL, SQL, and Data warehousing concepts.
target_students: |Software Developers|Analytics Professionals|ETL & SQL Developers and Architects|BI and Mainframe Professionals|Project Managers|Administrators|Data Integration developers|
review|1|review: Hi, this is Ravindra, I completed Informatica MDM Training at Mindmajix. Started the course with the little knowledge and ended up with the expertise level.
review|2|review: Informatica MDM course was absolutely great. Instructor taught all the concepts thoroughly and he is very knowledgeable, clarified and answered all the questions.
review|3|review: Perfect sessions to know all the key concepts of Informatica MDM. All credits to the trainers who took special care in presenting MDM practically. Thanks to the support team as well.
review|4|review: When I am looking for the Informatica MDM certification course, then my friend suggests mindmajix, really its a good institute for MDM training.
content: ['Introduction to Informatica MDM Hub', 'Define the Data model', 'Configure the Stage process', 'Configure the Load process', 'Configure the Match & Merge process', 'Configure data access views', 'Security Access Manager (SAM)', 'Log files', 'Admin Configuration Workbench - INFORMATICA DATA DIRECTOR', 'HIERARCHY MANAGEMENT', 'INTRODUCTION TO SIF', 'Practice Test & Interview Questions']
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified  Informatica MDM Professionals
